amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding for Executive Order 14019, relating to Promoting Access to Voting.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 202 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 202 (Roll no. 318).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
